content: A new proposal has been announced: try to not rely on attributes from extern crates #505. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.
@T-compiler: Proposal #505 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.
